Title: Shot All to Hell
Writer: Graham Yost (developed for television by), Chris Provenzano, Elmore Leonard (short story "Fire in the Hole"), Leonard Chang (story editor)
Actors: Timothy Olyphant, Nick Searcy, Jere Burns, Joelle Carter
Plot: Art stumbles on Theo Tonin's right-hand man while investigating Nicky Augustine's death, Boyd tries to tie up loose ends with Lee Paxton, the sheriff, and cousin Johnny, and Raylan tries to get the Crowes to leave Harlan.
